DOC.brief_summary: Our primary objective develop clinical pathway care patient colorectal surgery Clinic . In particular , investigator would like determine intraoperative concentration oxygen optimal patient .
DOC.brief_title: Supplemental Oxygen Colorectal Surgery : A Quality Improvement Project
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator therefore propose test primary hypothesis supplemental oxygen ( 80 % versus 30 % ) reduce risk composite surgical site infection potentially oxygen-related wound complication . Secondarily , investigator assess incremental cost benefit 80 % versus 30 % oxygen . As safety measure , enough oxygen always give maintain oxygen saturation ( determined pulse oximetry ) â‰¥95 % .
